benchmark_details.name: LLaV AR-2 (Hybrid Instruction Generation Dataset)
benchmark_details.overview: LLaV AR-2 is a high-quality dataset designed for visual instruction tuning that consists of detail-enriched captions and visual question-answering pairs, aimed at enhancing the performance of multimodal large language models.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To improve the performance of multimodal large language models on tasks involving text-rich images through high-quality instruction-following data.

data.source: Hybrid instruction generation between human annotations and GPT-4o in response to text-rich images.
data.annotation: Generated by combining human annotations with LLM-generated data.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated comparing model predictions against ground truth for visual question answering and captioning tasks.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better model performance in terms of similarity to human-generated answers or captions.
methodology.baseline_results: LLaV AR-2 achieves leading results against various existing models in text-rich image tasks.
methodology.validation: Empirical validation of the dataset is conducted by fine-tuning models and comparing performance metrics.
